summary: The life of a determined young girl is changed when she befriends her building's concierge, a solitary woman who is more than what she seems.
cast: Josiane Balasko|Garance Le Guillermic|Togo Igawa|Anne Brochet|Ariane Ascaride|Wladimir Yordanoff|Sarah Le Picard|Jean-Luc Porraz|Mona Heftre|Gisèle Casadesus|Samuel Achache|Valérie Karsenti|Stéphan Wojtowicz|Isabelle Sobelmann|Jeanne Candel|Chantal Banlier|Miyako Ribola|Nao Inazawa|Jérémie
title: El erizo
